title: Paytm|SSE|Noida
content:
Education: BTech in Computer Science(Tier 1)
Years of Experience: 3
Prior Experience: SDE at series B startup
Previous CTC: 25 LPA (including stocks and bonus)
Date of the Offer: October 2023
Company: Paytm
Title/Level: SSE
Location: Noida, India(WFH)
Salary: 26,,00,000
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 26 LPA
Other details: Recruiter did not bulge on stocks or bonuses. He was saying we dont give any of these now and hike was bare minimum on current offer.

Very disappointed with the offer.

Interview experience: 
https://leetcode.com/discuss/interview-experience/4193314/Volante-Technologies-or-Software-Engineer-or-Walkin-Chennai-or-Offer
Status: Rejeted the offer, I believe there is pay parity and my expectations were not satisfied.
